Html:
When trying to use the photo section I get this error:

Multiple controls with the same ID 'Image2' were found. FindControl requires that controls have unique IDs.

Is there a fix for this?

Thank you

Change one of the photos to a different name. It depends on which one, though.

What page is it and what version/changeset?

z2bass wrote:
Change one of the photos to a different name. It depends on which one, though.

What page is it and what version/changeset?


2.0/RC1

http://sahcinfo.org/photo/list.aspx

Cannot open any of the albums, I was just testing to see if I wished to use it, at the time I am using JAlbum

I now replaced the pages in the photo directory with pages from release 2, created an album, and was able to open it. But now the album was able to be deleted without signing in.
Replacing the files from the photo directory will do the trick. I fixed it in time for the 2.0 launch, but not RC1.
